Quick search

managefiles¶

This module contains functionality for file management.

Reference¶

apercal.subs.managefiles.director(self, option, dest, file_=None, verbose=True, ignore_nonexistent=False)[source]¶

director: Function to move, remove, and copy file_s and directories option: ‘mk’, ‘ch’, ‘mv’, ‘rm’, and ‘cp’ are supported dest: Destination of a file or directory to move to file_: Which file to move or copy, otherwise None ignore_nonexistent: ignore rm on existing files

apercal.subs.managefiles.imagetofits(self, mirimage, fitsimage, remove=True)[source]¶

Converts a MIRIAD image to a FITS image mirimage: The MIRIAD image to convert fitsimage: The converted FITS image
